full_summary:
**Title:** MSV 980 LP/SV Ancillary Parts
---------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01010393
**Amendment Number 3:** W8485-237370/A

**Publication Date:** October 18, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** January 12, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM

**Background:**

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of MSV 980 LP/SV Ancillary Parts.

**Procurement Details:**

* Item 1: 20-001-8245, Cover Life Preserver (70 units)
* Item 2: 20-001-8245, Cover Life Preserver (30 units)
* Item 3: 20-006-7704, Mask Bayonet, D-ring Assembly (70 units)
* Item 4: 20-006-7704, Mask Bayonet, D-ring Assembly (30 units)
* Item 5: 20-009-0161, Bladder Assembly, Life Preserver (60 units)
* Item 6: 20-009-0161, Bladder Assembly, Life Preserver (40 units)

**Delivery Information:**

All items are to be delivered to:

* CFSD Montreal
* CFSD Edmonton

**Timeline:**

The anticipated delivery date is January 30, 2023.

**Submission Requirements:**

Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service.

**Notice:**

Due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, reduced business hours and limited staff availability, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their proposals electronically.

**Language of Submission:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Procurement Method:**

This procurement is carried out in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**

The procurement is open to bidders worldwide.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Delivery:**

Delivery must be made to the Department of National Defence in Canada.

**Contact Information:**

 Danny Lebel
Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
Phone: None
 Fax: None

**Access to Documents:**

The tender documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website.

Note: Due to the specific requirements of the tender, the above text has been rewritten to ensure clarity and accuracy while maintaining a professional tone.
